alert.note: Alert for Brown; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:12PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Rock, northern Brown and Keya Paha Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wewela to 7 miles northwest of Johnstown. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bassett, Springview, Burton, Nets Peak, Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area, Meadville, North River Trail, Keller Park State Recreation Area, Thomas Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Pine Glen State Wildlife Refuge, Antelope Peak, Mills and Brocksburg. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 197 and 225. Highway 20 between mile markers 258 and 262. Highway 12 between mile markers 30 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
